page.title: 19HOUSING/BUCKINGHAM HOSPITAL.
page.content: Buckingham's housing has increased by about 50% in the last decade,whilst the population has risen by 46% to 6627 (1981 census figures). There are ten new housing estates in the area. A new semi-detached house costs about 35 000. Ten years ago this price was 12 000. { { BUCKINGHAM HOSPITAL. The hospital is due to be enlarged-it will soon be provided with another ward and better toilet facilities. About 16 patients are admitted every week. The latest funds raised by the League of Friends have been used to provide a pay-phone.
